com.soa.message
Interface MessageProperties

All Known Subinterfaces:
PolicyMessageProperties
public interface MessageProperties

Pre-defined Message properties.

Since:
5.0

Field Summary
static java.lang.String BINDING_FAULT
          The message property value for property FAULT_NAME that indicates that the fault has no name because it is not an application fault but a binding fault.

          Binding specific fault identifier (if any).

Field Detail

BINDING_FAULT_ID

static final java.lang.String BINDING_FAULT_ID
Binding specific fault identifier (if any).

See Also:
Constant Field Values

BINDING_FAULT_MSG

static final java.lang.String BINDING_FAULT_MSG
Binding specific fault message (if any).

See Also:
Constant Field Values

CONTENT_TYPE

static final java.lang.String CONTENT_TYPE
The Message has no standard way to hold a mime content type. This property is used to hold the value as a String (with any parameters concatenated if necessary). If this needs to be parsed or manipulated, the HeaderParser class can be used.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

TRANSPORT_HEADERS

static final java.lang.String TRANSPORT_HEADERS
The Message property that holds the transport headers. The value of the property is an instance of Headers.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

TRANSPORT_PARAMETERS

static final java.lang.String TRANSPORT_PARAMETERS
The Message property that holds the incoming transport (form and query) parameters. The value of the property is a Map with Strings for keys and a String[] values since parameters may be multi-valued. Note that the value for a parameter may be null. This Map is read-only. Values are not escaped.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

BINDING_HEADERS

static final java.lang.String BINDING_HEADERS
The property that holds the protocol headers if the message is normalized. The value of the property is a Map but the Map values are protocol-dependant. In the case of SOAP the values are the DocumentFragment containing the SOAP header.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

TRANSPORT_QUERY

static final java.lang.String TRANSPORT_QUERY
The Message property that holds the transport query string, if any. The value is an ENCODED string which has all special characters escaped as per RFC 2396.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

TRANSPORT_QUERY_MAP

static final java.lang.String TRANSPORT_QUERY_MAP
The Message property that holds the transport query as a Map, if any. This is only used on the outgoing (client) side. The transport will automatically convert the values in this map to a query string, encode it as appropriate, and append it to the value of TRANSPORT_QUERY, if any.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

TRANSPORT_STREAM

static final java.lang.String TRANSPORT_STREAM
The Message property that holds the transport stream as an InputStream, if available.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

SECURITY_SUBJECTS

static final java.lang.String SECURITY_SUBJECTS
The Message property that holds a Map of all JAAS security subjects associated with the message keyed by subject category (String).

See Also:
Constant Field Values

PROTOCOL_TYPE

static final java.lang.String PROTOCOL_TYPE
The Message property that holds the protocol binding type. The value will be one of the URIs defined in the WSDL 2.0 spec.

See Also:
com.soa.jbi.wsdl.WSDLConstants, Constant Field Values

PRE_CONFIGURED

static final java.lang.String PRE_CONFIGURED
Boolean property that, when true, indicates that the message has been pre-configured with binding information (headers and properties).

See Also:
Constant Field Values

FAULT_NAME

static final java.lang.String FAULT_NAME
The message property that holds the WSDL name of the fault in a message (String)

See Also:
Constant Field Values

BINDING_FAULT

static final java.lang.String BINDING_FAULT
The message property value for property FAULT_NAME that indicates that the fault has no name because it is not an application fault but a binding fault.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

FAULT_CODE

static final java.lang.String FAULT_CODE
The message property that holds the QName of the fault code of a fault. (QName)

See Also:
Constant Field Values

FAULT_STRING

static final java.lang.String FAULT_STRING
The message property that holds the string of a fault. (String)

See Also:
Constant Field Values

MESSAGE_SIZE

static final java.lang.String MESSAGE_SIZE
A Message property that can be used to report the size of the Message. The size may not have been calculated previously and the property would be null. It is recommended that if a client does calculate the size of the Message, the client set this property so that other clients may benefit from the calculation and save the overhead of recalculation. The value of the property is a Long.

See Also:
Constant Field Values
